text: After three years of being forced to sit on the sidelines from the WWE due to concussion issues, Daniel Bryan made his return at WrestleMania 34. Bryan teamed with SmackDown Live Commissioner to culminate their angle with Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn. Bryan and McMahon gained the victory in New Orleans, and Bryan proceeded into full - time competition on the blue brand. After being cleared by several doctors, WWE still refused to give the go - ahead for Bryan to return to in - ring action. Bryan was instead given the role of General Manager, which he admitted that he hated coming to work while in this position. Bryan also made it clear on several interviews that he would compete elsewhere if he did not get cleared from WWE.
